issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing "Animation - Transition", I noticed, that switching button bar (on the bottom of the page) brings additional line above button bar. It happens only in landscape mode on iPhone and iPod, and does not happen on iPad.

Steps:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Base UI-Animation-Transition
3. Rotate device on landscape mode
4. Press "One" button on the bottom of the page
5. Press "Two" button

Expected result:
Button bar should be changed on button bar with different color without additional line

Actual result:
Additional line appears while switching button bar
fields.summary: iOS: Animation - Additional line appears while switching button bar in landscape mode
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.1.201204132053
Titanium SDK: 2.0.2.v20120417133255
Devices: iPhone 4S (5.1), iPod 3rd Gen (4.0.2)

comments.body:
Issue reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
